dharmawabodhayen yuthu daruwan jiwithayen pala yanne nahakiriwehera chaithya wandanawaekama da ekama thanaanagarika dharmapalathumaatha harima purudu wemuuppalawanna theraniyakatharagama dewa wandanawawanasi yana bauddha urumayapimbaure shri uditha mahanahiminawa arahadi budu guna bhawanawaniwase kenaku miyagiyawita duk nowi sitiya hakida?daham ruwana thulin budu ruwana handuna ganimukula detuwan pidimalama gi saha kawidharmayata haniyak nowenna wesak dinaya samarannarahula podi hamuduruwosamisa prithiya windimisathara apayen midimaduka saha biyadhanayen pamanak sanasima labeda?ajan brahmawanso maha therun wahansebadajarikamath, akikarukamath nisa sanuharema winashayipathum pahan thiramudal nomathiwa sampath labana mangaksamadhi buduruwa abiyasapinbara sithin dharmaya asannasasara dukin midennata nam...kayagathasathi bhawanawalowada sangarawabudupamok maha sanganata dan dimen ha wihararama puja kirimen lada mahanargha pinakarunawapin labana nyathinkadawatha surigama shra්ri shilawansha daham pasalaapi wemu sirilaka bodu daruwogampala sinhapitiya bhawana madhyasthanayaada wanawita ajan brahmawanso maha therun wahansege namaya mulu lokayema prachalithaya.

janatha padanamak sahitha,chandaya diniya haki deshapalakayan saha (winishchayakarawaru ha niladharin wani) janathawata idiriyata ya yuthu nathi eseth nathahoth (agramathyawaraya wani) mathiwarana dinima pilibada wehesime wagakimen muktha karanu labu,enamuth sabawinma thirana ganna deshapalakayan athara pawathina shrama wibhajanaya wanahi prajathanthrawadi bhawithayehi pawathina wishishta upabedimaki.soniya ho rahul gandhi aanduwa bharawa sitina bawata upakalpanaya kirima barapathala waradda ganimaki.winishchayakarawarun,niladharin ha deshapalagnyayangen samanwitha simitha pirisakagen yuktha parshadayak atha saba balaya eekarashi wi thibe.ottu thabime tharaga wala diwimata damanu labu ashwayan samuhayak men mowun kalin kalata - adu wadi washayen rate siyalu dewal ayithiwa sitina maha samagam kihipayak wisin- pathkaranu meheyawanu ha sahaya dakwanu labe.mowun wenas paksha walata ayathwiya haka.esema ekinekage darunu deshapalana pasamithuran lesa maha ragadakwimwaladi katayuthu kirimatath ida atha.namuth eya hudek mahajanayage winodaswadaya udesa nishpadanaya karana lada prayogayaki.ekama saba pasamithuruthawaya wanahi maha samagam athara pawathina wyaparamaya pasamithurutha pamani.
esema methek kalak ohu gawa patti himiyanta udyanaya thula rakawal sapayu bawath, maruwima labu awasthawedi sakakaruwange wadi ginibath kara athi bawath amathiwaraya kiweya.
umbaata lankawata aawama wisathare thakketama poyintar wela wage ne ban.

hama kenektama aragalayak thibuna...ee wassa ekkada ehemath nathnam wena deyak ekkada kiyala hitha ganna amaruyi..samaharu kudayath ekka aragalayaka..kudaya hulangath ekka aragalayaka...thawath samaharu themenne nathiwa inna aragalayaka...me hama aragalayaktama bhauthikawa deparshawayak innawa...eeth ehema nathi aragalath thiyenawa..eewa amaruyi..ee aragala thiyenne thamange hithath ekka...ee aragala dinaganna echcharama amaru nisayi(lu) kalpayakata eka budu kenek witharak pahala wenne..bhadra kalpayakata hatharayi..me api inne anna ee wage bhadra kalpayaka...thawa budu kenek pahala wenakan niwan dakinna...

enam 18 ta atha esawimen karagath waradata siwil samajayen ella wu wiwechanayata alankarika pilithurak (api thamayi 19 sammatha kaleth wani) soyaganimayi. 19 sammatha kirimen yam pamanakata sammadam wima (e.ja.ni.pa atham ihala pela nayakayan pawa kiwe api nathinam 19 kunu bakkiyata yana bawayi) ha 19 dadamima karagena 20 wannak perata gena ehi wasiya da thama pakshayata ganimayi. 20 ta sudanam 20 sanshodhanaya purwa-yahapalana aanduwe mathiwarana poronduwak nowunath rajaya pihituwimen pasuwa ejanipa ya ee kerehi wadi awadhanayak yomukara thibe.

rohitha bogollagama mahatha h ee wagema me ratei wisheshanga sihinen awidinnanta wahana sapayima thaman kisidu ayurakin yuddhayakata yanne nathi bawath, yud mahathata uthuru nagenahira drawida janathawage sahaya laba dena bawata prachara pawathini. 1999 desambar pawathi shri lankawe 04 wani janadhipathiwaranayedi da el.ti.ti.ee. sanwidhanaye balapam athiwa ho nathiwa uthuru nagenahira drawida janathawage bahuthara sahaya labune ranil wikramasinha mahathataya janapathi helikoptarayen kolambaa eddi mahindananda gal loriyaka .

api ee gana kanagatu wenawa, eewagema ee pilibandawa samawa illa sitinawa. 1981 di ewakata thamange eksath jathika paksha aanduwa wiisin rata palanaya karanu labu kalayedi yapanaya pusthakalaya ginithabima sambandhayen, ewaka pawathi eksath jathika paksha rajata wenuwen thaman mese samawa illa sitina bawa pa්rakashakara atha. 1981 wasare mayi masa 31 wenida ratha්riyedi yapanaye minisunge wisheshayen yapanaye daruwange hadawatha bandu wu meki yapanaya pusthakalaya ginithabu bawata madhya wartha sihiganwayi.
shri lankawa athsan thaba athi jathyanthara, kalapiya saha dwiparshawiya welanda giwisum ha eyata adala nithi regulasi menma eewayehi prathilabha yanadi wisheshanga da meyata athulath we.
